data.chText: 公制单位 / 尺寸 / 大小
英国的货币于1971年实行公制。
按公制制作的；用公制测量的
data.enText: made or measured using the metric system

data.chText: 这些螺丝钉是用公制尺码制造的。

tr: a system of related measures that facilitates the quantification of some particular characteristic
a decimal unit of measurement of the metric system (based on meters and kilograms and seconds)
example: convert all the measurements to metric units
it is easier to work in metric

tr: a function of a topological space that gives, for any two points in the space, a value equal to the distance between them
based on the meter as a standard of measurement

value.def: Metric means relating to the metric system.

example.ex: Around 180,000 metric tons of food aid is required...
example.tran: 需要大约18万公吨的食品援助。

example.ex: Converting metric measurements to U.S. equivalents is easy.
example.tran: 将公制计量单位换算为美制计量单位十分简单。
